ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons I Can't Believe It's Not Butter!® Spread, divided
1 (5.4 ounce) package Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Herb & Butter, prepared according to package directions
1 (10 ounce) package frozen cut green beans, prepared according to package directions

cookingTips: Use fresh lemon juice for brighter flavor than bottled juice
Don't overcook the shrimp; they cook quickly and become tough if overdone
Prepare the rice mix and green beans ahead of time for faster assembly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a quick weeknight meal using convenience products. Would you like tips on selecting quality frozen vegetables?
